| Property             | Attribute              | Description | Type                                           | Default     |
| -------------------- | ---------------------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------- | ----------- |

| `controlsType`       | `controls-type`        |             | `ControlsType.ORBIT \| ControlsType.TRACKBALL` | `undefined` |
